blackbox_ai_description: Chat with Blackbox, with web search toggle.
welcome_enhanced_digital_hub: Welcome to Your Enhanced Digital Hub!
explore_suite_ai_tools: Explore a suite of AI-powered tools and creative utilities designed to inspire and assist you. Here's what you can do:
feature_ai_chat_desc: Engage in intelligent conversations, ask questions, get assistance, and enable web search for up-to-date information. Your creative partner for ideas and problem-solving.
feature_image_generator_desc: Unleash your creativity by generating unique images from text prompts. Describe your vision and watch it come to life. Save your favorite creations!
feature_story_generator_desc: Craft compelling narratives and short stories from a simple theme or title. Explore different genres and let the AI weave engaging tales for you.
feature_gemini_vision_chat_desc: Engage with the Gemini model for text and image-based conversations. Get answers to your questions about images or simply chat with a cutting-edge AI.
feature_gpt4_vision_chat_desc: Interact with the advanced GPT-4o model. Ask questions, get text-based assistance, and analyze images with this powerful AI chat.
feature_blackbox_ai_desc: Converse with Blackbox AI, featuring a web search toggle for up-to-date information and answers.
feature_deepseek_ai_desc: Explore the capabilities of Deepseek AI for insightful conversations and complex queries.
feature_claude_haiku_desc: Interact with Anthropic's Claude Haiku model, known for its efficiency and natural language prowess.
feature_box_movie_desc: Explore, search, and discover a vast library of movies. Get details, watch trailers, and manage your watchlist all in one place.
feature_weather_details_desc: Get the latest weather updates for your location or any city, including current conditions and a 5-day forecast, presented in a clear and detailed view.
feature_activity_history_desc: Keep track of your interactions and activities within the site. Review your journey and easily revisit your favorite features.
feature_email_generator_desc: Generate temporary email addresses quickly for privacy or testing purposes. Receive emails and manage them for a short period.
chatgpt_all_model_description_feature: Engage with a variety of OpenAI's models, upload files, and explore diverse AI capabilities.

blackbox_welcome_message: Hi! I'm Blackbox AI. Ask me anything or toggle web search.
